record.field: Norphonic VoIP Phone with Keypad - 1000mm Cable

Norphonic Heavy Duty VoIP Telephone with Keypad and 1000mm Cable - designed for harsh environment installations requiring reliable communication.
Key Features: - Industrial-grade VoIP telephone for critical infrastructure - Heavy-duty aluminum die-cast enclosure (painted orange) - Full numeric keypad with metal buttons - High-performance acoustic components - HD voice quality - 1000mm cable for flexible installation - Advanced echo and noise cancellation - SIP and STENTOFON Pulse protocols - PoE (Power over Ethernet) and external power options - Built-in relay outputs and digital inputs - Emergency call functions and autodial - RFID reader option - Local and remote diagnostics

Housing resistant to: - Salt water and salt mist - Industrial oils and lubricants - Most cleaning chemicals and disinfectants - Corrosive atmospheric environments - Diesel, gasoline and petroleum-based products - Mild acids and alkalis
Special corrosion-resistant coating provides long-term protection in marine environments. All external hardware is made from marine-grade stainless steel.

DNV GL Type Approval Certificate IEC 60945 Maritime Navigation Equipment EN 50121-4 Railway Applications EN 60529 IP66 Ingress Protection IEC 60068-2-6 Vibration IEC 60068-2-27 Shock Designed for ATEX Zone 2 compliance (with optional accessory)

Specially designed for offshore platforms, vessels, tunnels, roadside emergency call points, and industrial sites with extreme conditions.
Features internal heater for cold environments to prevent condensation and ensure reliable operation in freezing temperatures.
Metal keypad is designed to be operated with gloves and remain responsive in all environmental conditions.
Acoustic design ensures clear communication even in high-noise environments (up to 100+ dB ambient noise).
1000mm cable allows flexible mounting while providing protection against vandalism and extreme weather conditions.
